item.title: Wrecking Ball Media
item.description: From February 2015 to February 2016 I was a contracting engineer at Wrecking Ball Media Group. As a part of this team I worked on a web based community platform for Adobe. The project utilized several different APIs from Adobe and other vendors to create a white labeled site for connecting and empowering creative youth.
